attributes.action: Have a local election after Christian Wakeford Bury South MP switched parties
attributes.additional_details: Give the vote back to the people, its pointless voting when MP's just switch mid term.
attributes.background:
Christian Wakeford Bury South MP left the Conservative party for Labour.
The local area voted for Conservative not Labour, its makes a mockery of the voting system. 
The people spoke, if you leave a party it must go back to the public vote.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory by-election for MPs who resign from their party or lose the whip: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606743
